jobDescription: The Role / Responsibilities:Design, write, and execute manual and automated tests using BDD format and Gherkin.Assist with clarification of functional and non-functional requirements for financial web-based application.Use bug tracking systems to submit, track and manage defects.Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activitiesUse database commands to create test data and analyze results.Be responsible for overall quality of assigned features.Perform thorough regression and integration testing.Follow established QA process in the SDLC.Ability to write test plans and strategies.Qualifications:Current 2nd year - Sophomores, Graduating in 2020Pursuing Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, IT, Software Engineering/Developer, TechnologyExcellent verbal and written communications skills.Basic knowledge of one or more object oriented programming languages- C#, Java, etc.Basic database skills.Good analytical and diagnostic skills as well as attention to detail.Able to work well within the constructs of an agile process, including SCRUM, Continuous Build and Integration, etc.Qualifications:Current 2nd year - Sophomores, Graduating in 2020Pursuing Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, IT, Software Engineering/Developer, TechnologyExcellent verbal and written communications skills.Basic knowledge of one or more object oriented programming languages- C#, Java, etc.Basic database skills.Good analytical and diagnostic skills as well as attention to detail.Able to work well within the constructs of an agile process, including SCRUM, Continuous Build and Integration, etc.
